name: Power of the Light
description: Summon an expanding beam of pure sunlight to doom an enemy, dealing 1161 Physical Damage to them and copying all their damage taken from you for 6 seconds and releasing 50% of it as additional Physical Damage to them.  Maximum copied damage: 3150. This value scales off your Weapon Damage.  Targets are also afflicted with Minor Breach, reducing their Physical and Spell Resistance by 2974 for 9 seconds.
effectLines: Converts into a Stamina ability and deals Physical Damage, and applies Minor Breach to the enemy.
coefDescription: Summon an expanding beam of pure sunlight to doom an enemy, dealing $1 Physical Damage to them and copying all their damage taken from you for 6 seconds and releasing 50% of it as additional Physical Damage to them.  Maximum copied damage: $2. This value scales off your Weapon Damage.  Targets are also afflicted with Minor Breach, reducing their Physical and Spell Resistance by 2974 for 9 seconds.
